[h1]Portal 2 Reminds how good my childhood was, I'm so Touch right now.............. I remember my childhood when she sing a song in the part when she said "You Want Your Freedom? Take it..... That's what I'm counting on " And I was like so happy and cried so deep into my heart üò≠,And with that being said Portal 2 is always in my heart Forever[/h1]
Amazing game, I've played the main story way too many times.

Decided to update my review since I played it more- this is a game that you can get a lot of hours on if you stick with it. You like puzzles? You like futuristic technology? You like when a computer tries to kill you? If so, this is the game for you. This game is a masterpiece, with graphics that still look better than a lot of games made today, puzzles that make you scream at your monitor in frustration, and an amazing story.

The main story will take about 4-5 hours, along with the co-op mode that will probably get you 2-3 hours, and endless player-made test chambers. Did all of that? Just go into random co-op games and try to make some friends, unlike me, who is probably the most antisocial person in the world. Can't make any friends? You get to start your endless grind of achievement hunting! I have nearly 200 hours and still need to get about 15 achievements. Did that? Take a year-long break from the game, come back when you're bored, and start playing even more community-made maps- except mine. Don't you think about playing my maps.

Alright, you get the basic premise of this review- buy this game. Just do it. You'll never regret it.
This game is so awesome . Every gamer should try it ^^
Uno de los mejores videojuegos que he jugado.
Great game would recommend playing it.

Very good game produced by 'Valve'. They created interesting story, characters and environment (Testing rooms). Game is also full of good humor, I really laughed while playing. These elements combined with nice music and graphics giving excellent product named "Portal 2". Here we have also example, that game can be exciting without violent, nudity or bad language. It was pleasure to play, Recommended

A little bit short, but fun as heck game. The riddles are on the rather easy side, but they are still entertaining. I'd recommend it even without playing the co-op mode.

I'm suuuuper late to this game but my goodness was I glad I was browsing through the steam store one night. Portal 2 is hands down one of the greatest games I've ever played. I bought Portal 1 the same night and couldn't stop playing. 

The story is top notch and hilarious. Well thought out and great voice acting. You can tell the amount of care and effort put into this game in 2011, now in 2019 you'll be hard pressed to find a $60 game with this much love.

Whether its on sale or full price pick this game up both 1 & 2, you won't regret it!

oh mama.... I love you glado's so glad os you dropped by. Ahem this is an anouncement for all you hulagins who have been wasting away you're life not doing my tests. Oh high so I got out of space finally! So sorry about all that earlier yeah turns out its just a game I know right! Who would have thought that. No one thats who. You are such a moron.... ( thank you glado's for those uplifting words. I'm not finished with you Chell... 

Wait hold on a second... Thats not in the game?! Ok ok I need to actually clear some of this up.
We don't actually have a game. Its all a real simulation made by valve. This is 100% not a game. So you should have a good time! Get a sandwitch and get kidnapped. No I didn't mean that. No matter what I just need to say I love you. We don't have a lot of time. Just do this for me, please. Don't forget to use both portals. Last time I only used the one. Burned my face clean off. Oh don't worry my boys at the lab grew it back. So if you want to lose brain cells and need a very unchallenging simple cough "game" don't disapoint me...

[h1] Criticisms accepted + No Spoilers [/h1]
(If there are spelling mistakes sorry) (Also no multiplayer stuff because I have no friends that I have finished it with)
Hello this is my review of Portal 2 which is as you will most likely know this is the second installment of Portal and (whilst I probably won't do a review of it) it is no where near as good as this one. This one's singleplayer has a great storyline whilst the puzzles are kind of hard. Some are difficult whilst others are just way too easy.
I am going to do my Pros and Cons and they give my final rating out of 10
Pros:
Fun narrative.
Good design choices.
Decent Length.
Ending very cute.

The narrative was very good and fun from the beginning where you can't talk so Wheatly just asks why are you jumping because the game says that's how you talk. Things like that is what makes the good narrative. The Design of places and how different sections has the audio so well fit that it immerses you very well. The ending was also pretty cute but I won't touch on it too much because I'm not putting any spoilers in even with the tag.

Cons:
Boss fight easier and not as much puzzle as a part of it.
Ending not good.
Characters aren't as fleshed out for being what they are.

The Boss fight is extremely easy compared to the first in my opinion and the ending is not explained everything just kind of happens. The characters are made a bit more life iike but aren't really fleshed out at all they are just like, hey these are robots thanks for asking bye. It's just kind of sad they couldn't flesh them out a bit more.

Anyway here is my review of the main Singleplayer Campaign, now for my rating with all the Pros and Cons I am going to have to rate it a 8/10.

Thanks for reading!

Portal 2 is a abosutely amazing game. The gameplay and music are great but the sory has too many plotholes to be givin a rank as high as those. 

I met some of my greatest friends here. This is one of the only games where the community is not toxic, and i respect it fully for that
